attributes.action: make an urgent public statement to explain why is it appropriate for Tony McNulty to apologise to the House of Commons for the attempted fraud of thousands of taxpayer pounds.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Taxpayers feel it will be much more appropriate for Fraudster McNulty to apologise to taxpayers and NOT his fellow criminal fraudsters in the House of Commons.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
